Content:: Kuda Widanalage Shantha Bandara is a Sri Lankan politician, a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka for national list from 8 January 2019.He was a member of the parliament for Kurunegala from 2010 to 2015.[1][2][3]  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
